flawed_nl_solution:
Carl saved in 6 weeks $25/week x 6 weeks = $<<25*6=105>>105
On the seventh week, he ended up having to pay in bills $105/3 = $<<105/3=35>>35
His savings were then $105 - $35 = $<<105-35=70>>70
His dad gave him $170 - $70 = $<<170-70=100>>100
#### 100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
